blocks.name: wlimeq12
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the limit class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm wlimeq12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cwlim(c0, c2), cwlim(c1, c3), crab(hs0, c2, wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c2, c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0)))), crab(hs0, c3, wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c3, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1)))), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, c2, c3, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c2, c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0))), wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c3, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c2, c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0)), wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c3, c3, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1)))
  neeq2d(cv(hs0), cinf(c2, c2, c0), cinf(c3, c3, c1), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  infeq123d(c2, c2, c0, c3, c3, c1, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0), csup(cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  supeq123d(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), c2, c0, cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0)), c3, c1, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  mp3an3(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(hs0)), cpred(c1, c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  equid(hs0)
  predeq123(c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  simpr(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  simpl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  df-wlim(hs0, c0, c2)
  df-wlim(hs0, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm wlimeq12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3)→ WLim(c0, c2)= WLim(c1, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(WLim(c0, c2), WLim(c1, c3), { hs0 ∈ c2 |(hs0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c0)∧ hs0 = sup(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0))}, { hs0 ∈ c3 |(hs0 ≠ inf(c3, c3, c1)∧ hs0 = sup(Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1))}, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, c2, c3, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3), (hs0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c0)∧ hs0 = sup(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0)), (hs0 ≠ inf(c3, c3, c1)∧ hs0 = sup(Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1)))
  anbi12d((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3), hs0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c0), hs0 = sup(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0), hs0 ≠ inf(c3, c3, c1), hs0 = sup(Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1))
  neeq2d(hs0, inf(c2, c2, c0), inf(c3, c3, c1), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3))
  infeq123d(c2, c2, c0, c3, c3, c1, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3))
  eqeq2d(hs0, sup(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0), sup(Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1), (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3))
  supeq123d(Pred(c0, c2, hs0), c2, c0, Pred(c1, c3, hs0), c3, c1, (c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3))
  mp3an3(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, Pred(c0, c2, hs0)= Pred(c1, c3, hs0), hs0 = hs0)
  equid(hs0)
  predeq123(c0, c1, c2, c3, hs0, hs0)
  simpr(c0 = c1, c2 = c3)
  simpl(c0 = c1, c2 = c3)
  df-wlim(hs0, c0, c2)
  df-wlim(hs0, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  nfrab(s0, hs0, c1, wa(wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c1, c1, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), c1, c0))))
  nfan(s0, wne(cv(hs0), cinf(c1, c1, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), c1, c0)))
  nfne(s0, cv(hs0), cinf(c1, c1, c0))
  nfinf(s0, c1, c1, c0)
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), csup(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), c1, c0))
  nfsup(s0, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), c1, c0)
  nfpred(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfwlim(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, WLim(c0, c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, WLim(c0, c1), { hs0 ∈ c1 |(hs0 ≠ inf(c1, c1, c0)∧ hs0 = sup(Pred(c0, c1, hs0), c1, c0))})

  nfan(s0, hs0 ≠ inf(c1, c1, c0), hs0 = sup(Pred(c0, c1, hs0), c1, c0))
  nfne(s0, hs0, inf(c1, c1, c0))
  nfinf(s0, c1, c1, c0)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, sup(Pred(c0, c1, hs0), c1, c0))
  nfsup(s0, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), c1, c0)
  nfpred(s0, c0, c1, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm elwlim(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ WLim(c1, c2)↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ c0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c1)∧ c0 = sup(Pred(c1, c2, c0), c2, c1)))

  bitr4i(c0 ∈ WLim(c1, c2), (c0 ∈ c2 ∧ c0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c1)∧ c0 = sup(Pred(c1, c2, c0), c2, c1)), (c0 ∈ c2 ∧(c0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c1)∧ c0 = sup(Pred(c1, c2, c0), c2, c1))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, WLim(c1, c2), c2, (c0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c1)∧ c0 = sup(Pred(c1, c2, c0), c2, c1)), (hs0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c1)∧ hs0 = sup(Pred(c1, c2, hs0), c2, c1)))

  eqeq12d(hs0, sup(Pred(c1, c2, hs0), c2, c1), c0, sup(Pred(c1, c2, c0), c2, c1), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  supeq1d(Pred(c1, c2, hs0), c2, c1, Pred(c1, c2, c0), hs0 = c0)
  predeq3(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-wlim(hs0, c1, c2)
  3anass(c0 ∈ c2, c0 ≠ inf(c2, c2, c1), c0 = sup(Pred(c1, c2, c0), c2, c1))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: wsucex
blocks.content: Existence theorem for well-founded successor. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: wsuccl
blocks.content: If ` X ` is a set with an ` R ` successor in ` A ` , then its well-founded successor is a member of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: wsuclb
blocks.content: A well-founded successor is a lower bound on points after ` X ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2018.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)

  -| wi(w0, wwe(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wse(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, c1, c0))
} = {
  sylnibr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cwsuc(c1, c2, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, cinf(cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3), c2, c1)))
  mpd(w0, wn(wbr(c0, c1, cinf(cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3), c2, c1))), wcel(c0, cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3)))
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3)), wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c3))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c3), wbr(c3, c1, c0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c3), wbr(c3, c1, c0)), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  brcnvg(c0, c2, c3, c4, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3)), wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c3)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c0, c2))
  elpredg(c3, c4, c0, c2, ccnv(c1))
  inflb(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3), c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wor(c1, c2), wwe(c1, c2))
  weso(c1, c2)
  wsuclem(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c2, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wrex(hs3, c2, wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs3))), wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c3, c1, c0))
  rspcev(hs3, c0, c2, wbr(c3, c1, c0), wbr(c3, c1, cv(hs3)))
  breq2(cv(hs3), c0, c3, c1)
  breq2i(c0, c1, cwsuc(c1, c2, c3), cinf(cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3), c2, c1))
  df-wsuc(c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(cpred(ccnv(c1), c2, c3))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.w(wbr(c3, c1, c0))
}

thm wsuclb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ¬ c0[c1]wsuc(c1, c2, c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≤ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[Se]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3[c1]c0)
} = {
  sylnibr(w0, c0[c1]wsuc(c1, c2, c3), c0[c1]inf(Pred(`' c1, c2, c3), c2, c1))
  mpd(w0, ¬ c0[c1]inf(Pred(`' c1, c2, c3), c2, c1), c0 ∈ Pred(`' c1, c2, c3))
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈ Pred(`' c1, c2, c3), c0[`' c1]c3)
  mpbird(w0, c0[`' c1]c3, c3[c1]c0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[`' c1]c3 ↔ c3[c1]c0), c0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  brcnvg(c0, c2, c3, c4, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∈ Pred(`' c1, c2, c3)↔ c0[`' c1]c3), c3 ∈ c4, c0 ∈ c2)
  elpredg(c3, c4, c0, c2, `' c1)
  inflb(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, Pred(`' c1, c2, c3), c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ≺ c2, c1 ≤ c2)
  weso(c1, c2)
  wsuclem(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c2, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ∃(hs3 ∈ c2, c3[c1]hs3), c0 ∈ c2, c3[c1]c0)
  rspcev(hs3, c0, c2, c3[c1]c0, c3[c1]hs3)
  breq2(hs3, c0, c3, c1)
  breq2i(c0, c1, wsuc(c1, c2, c3), inf(Pred(`' c1, c2, c3), c2, c1))
  df-wsuc(c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(Pred(`' c1, c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(Pred(`' c1, c2, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(Pred(`' c1, c2, c3))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.w(c3[c1]c0)
}
